index.content: index → int (Read Only): The index of this Body in its Actor COMP (owner).

owner.content: owner → OP (Read Only): The Actor COMP to which this body belongs.

rotate.content: rotate → tdu.Vector : Get or set the body's rotation in world space.

translate.content: translate → tdu.Position : Get or set the body's translation in world space.

angularVelocity.content: angularVelocity → tdu.Vector : Get or set the body's angular velocity.

linearVelocity.content: linearVelocity → tdu.Vector : Get or set the body's linear velocity.

applyImpulseForce.content:
applyImpulseForce(force, relPos=None)→ None: Applies impulse force to a body in a Bullet simulation.
force - The impulse force to apply to the body.
relPos (Keyword, Optional) - If specified, applies the force at the relative position, otherwise applied at (0,0,0).

applyTorque.content:
applyTorque(torque)→ None: Applies torque to a body in a Bullet simulation. The torque will only be applied for a single frame.
torque - The torque to apply to the body this frame.

applyImpulseTorque.content:
applyImpulseTorque(torque)→ None: Applies impulse torque to a body in a Bullet simulation.
torque - The impulse torque to apply to the body.
